poem:
The Alchemy of Wishes  

In quiet corners, dreams ignite—  
a dance of atoms, unseen light.  
In bubbling flasks, surging hope,  
though science scoffs, hearts still elope.  

The sun, a fusion, men adore;  
within small hearts, the promise soars.  
Unseen worlds may yet unfold,  
as dreams persist in whispers bold.
